website_summaries.verdict: The LG Volt smartphone shines on Boost Mobile thanks to its beefy battery, Spark LTE compatibility, and affordable price.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the iPhone 3gs/4s/5c, an HTC One X, Samsung Galaxy SIII, HTC Incredible and a few other smartphones. This LG Volt is by far the fastest, most responsive and impressive phone I have ever owned. Hands down, for $69.99, this phone is a steal. You can easily compare this phone to others in the $250-600 range. I mean who wouldn't want a quad core processor, a gig of ram and 4g speeds for under $75? Five stars; hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for a year and I hated it. It worked fine for a month and then it just went straight to hell. The keyboard kept disappearing.it would take forever the write a text message I would type one word and the keyboard would disappear and it would not show up. The phone would freeze constantly. I couldn't keep any apps on the phone even with an external memory card. I had to constantly delete everything on the phone. I couldn't take pictures it would freeze while trying to take a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly AWESOME for how cheap this phone is
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly AWESOME for how cheap this phone is...... HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!! my dad (50 yrs old) got this upgrading from a dinosaur android... and he does not know smart phones very much (ive slowly been teaching him all the cool things he can do on androids) and he caught on very quick with this phone... super easy to use, looks GREAT, is fast, everything is AWESOME.... (3+ months later after buying) I would have bought one for myself as well... except it is WAY too huge!!!! it wont fit in my pocket, and to me that makes a phone useless... so im sad about that... but my dad LOVESSS this phone! (he's also discovered youtube... hahaha)
customer_reviews.author: Asinine Republic

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: The LG Volt is powerful and fast! All the processing power and slim design are in one package with this phone! This is a huge step up from my previous phone and runs the Android 4.4 KitKat. Very nice. If you want a phone that packs a punch but doesn't break the bank then this is the phone for anyone looking to save a pretty penny. Very affordable for a fast and powerful phone. Two thumbs up, five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery of a greater phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great. it came in as advertised, new. undamaged box. and ready to go. great battery life. great screen. and its very snappy. i upgraded from having a samsung prevail.. and using a samsung captivate as a home tablet with wifi. battery can last me up to three days if i conserve and only play games when necessary. the screen. it very crisp. though i am not used to the hyper HD of the s5s and things like that. i love rooting my phones. it wasnt really needed since the phone was already great. but i wanted to debloat the 3-4 apps it had.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: I've used this phone for a long time. This is very nice. Just buy extra memory in a microSD card... you can get them for $10 for 32GB. 32GB I think is the max. I have a 64GB microSD, but I haven't tried it. 32GB is plenty. Although I think most cellphone should offer 16GB... memory is a lot cheaper now it just manufacturers wanting to charge more for a little more memory [sic] Apple. I did buy a protective plastic which just now is starting to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Richard CSUF MSA, Wisconsin MBA

customer_reviews.title: The phone is great for the price and the battery is great
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great for the price and the battery is great. I really love how the home button lights up with different kinds of colors. The speakers aren't the best but they're not the worst. The reason why I gave the phone 3 stars was because the phone was quick and snappy but after a few months, I noticed the phone was starting to lag and freeze. The screen sometimes became unresponsive on certain areas of the screen and the ram management was awful since the phone froze so badly even if I restart the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: its ok, i guess
customer_reviews.text: Just received this phone on the 17th of June. The first day was great, but I am starting to have issues. Next time i'll stick to the stores. I needed a phone quickly and for the price, it's better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Bastien

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is great!! Other than that I find it to ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is great!! Other than that I find it to be laggy and there is definitely a delay with the touch screen IF it decides to work at all. I have to constantly restart it to get it to work properly. Freezes a lot also. Picture quality is decent. Personally wouldn't buy this phone again, but for the price I suppose it could be worse. If it wasn't so laggy and freezy I'd rate it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tedrow

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my LG Volt, the phone has great voice quality, its simple and easy to use. Its like carrying around a little computer, internet access is fast, picture quality is good and my music sounds great.The phone came with lots of apps and a decent amount of space to add what I needed and best of all the price was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: LG Volt overall performance
customer_reviews.text: Update: This phone's performance has diminished severely over the past few months (dropped calls, app abrubt stoppages, et) Great phone, but be careful what's downloaded to it, (i.e. games, and apps), as certain apps (bejewelled blitz, Tetris) affected my keyboard. One "flaw" I've encountered was once the screen lock (PIN or password) is in place, I haven't found a way to go back to the default without resetting the entire phone (which isn't an option)
customer_reviews.author: M. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Boost service is pretty good but has also gone down a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is now my regular phone and works well. It has not responded to button push on a couple of occasions since I bought it but a simple restart fixed the issue. Boost service is pretty good but has also gone down a couple of times for short periods. A co-worker also has a Boost phone (different model) and his service stopped working on the same 2 occasions as well. Still I'm pleased with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good phone
customer_reviews.text: My first 4g phone, which I find quite pleasing in most ways. I do question the clarity of the call reception, and possibly the quality of my voice to those on the other end. Neither is bad, but neither seems as clear and natural as my previous Kyocera Hydro phone which is much smaller and less expensive. That may or may not be what other owners of the Volt experience, but so far that is mine. I still am happy with this phone and happy with Android systems.
customer_reviews.author: Brewman

customer_reviews.title: Screen cracked too easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my 16 year old. He loves it! He's on it constantly streaming videos, etc. So far has not had any problems with phone or service. My issue is the screen cracked too easily. He accidentally sat on it and even though he didn't put his full weight on it the screen cracked at the bottom. He's still able to use it (somehow) but it looks horrible to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Carol

customer_reviews.title: p.o.s.
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone since December and its time for a new one. Does not hold a charge. Keyboard stopped working. Apps constantly shut down while I'm using them. Constantly says the internal memory is full when there are no new pictures or anything. It's sad. I really liked this pos,but don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: kkh

customer_reviews.title: Piece of poo
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after two days. LG told me to call my provider and they said it was a warranty claim and to call LG who promptly said to call my provider again. Second LG phone to do the same thing. Better to buy a cheapie Samsung phone. Havent had any problem with my galaxy grand prime.
customer_reviews.author: Papabear2011

customer_reviews.title: and love this phone so far
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about 5 days, and love this phone so far. It's quiet fast, display is great, and...nicely sized. I'm used to Galaxy S II, so this phone seems smaller -- since it's actually narrower than the Galaxy. But I like it. The newer OS is great too. Much more functionalities than the previous phone. Wish it had more RAM, though. Think it just started slowing down(?)
customer_reviews.author: ERIC OH

customer_reviews.title: A surprising value.
customer_reviews.text: For as cheap as this is, it works! I'm very pleased with my purchase and Boost is a no-hassle as they get. (I've tried big companies, small companies and Boost is my favorite, thus far.) I was a little afraid that this phone would be a piece of junk, considering I paid less than $100 for it but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: A. Waters

customer_reviews.title: A Basic Smart Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is ok. The user manual is unbelievable. You have to download it from the internet. All 160-plus pages! It is apalling & Boost Customer Serv was a joke so I managed to get it activated & set-up myself. The phone is fairly easy to use. If are looking for something for heavy graphics use, this phone is not for you. This phone is better suited for downloading/streaming music or surfing the net.
customer_reviews.author: Shenandoah93

customer_reviews.title: Primarily use as portable GPS - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this primarily as a GPS. Downloaded the required apps via wifi and started using right away. Works great - on foot, by bicycle, or in the car. Battery life seems to be good, but haven't really put it to the test. Light weight, responsive screen and Kit Kat Android. I have not signed up for phone service - works fine without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jiiji

customer_reviews.title: this little phone is AWESOME. The size is good
customer_reviews.text: So far...this little phone is AWESOME. The size is good, I thought I would not like a big phone, but the Volt size is okay. The camera is SUPER and I wish I could say the same for the Video mode. But I'd rather have the great camera anyway, so it's not a deal breaker for me. This phone is simple to learn about and someday this 58 year just might figure it all out.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: As the owner of several premium smartphones, unbelievably this LG Volt has become my daily use phone. I take it everywhere, as I can't kill the battery. Perfect portability size, clear speaker, etc. Of course, where I live gets great boost mobile, (sprint coverage). Best phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen W.

customer_reviews.title: Is old phone
customer_reviews.text: Is old phone. Was good then, but now don't buy is old phone
customer_reviews.author: A tree frog

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone this morning. After playing with it almost all day, I can easily say that I love this phone. I haven't had any problems, everything runs fast and smooth. The battery life is amazing, and compared to my old phones, it has quite a bit of space. The screen is big, and clear. I saw a lot of people saying that the quality of the screen was low. So far it is the best I have ever had. The cameras are both great, especially for $60. It is very light, and I am terrified of dropping it, but that's what cases are for. Overall, it is an AMAZING phone.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value on a terrific phone
customer_reviews.text: LG Volt was the perfect upgrade for my new Boost Mobile Service. The 8g internal memory solved my problems I had with my original Tribute and the Volt has some extra features not available on the Tribute. And WHAT a VALUE! Yes, the box was beat up but WHO CARES? That goes in the recycle bin anyway! Great experience, easy purchase, timely delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sara L. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Great, if all you're doing is texting and making phone calls.
customer_reviews.text: What seemed like a great purchase at first quickly devolved into a frustrating experience every time I used it. With only 1gb of RAM, the phone would frequently freeze, crash, or shut down. It couldn't even handle stock applications like the keyboard (for more than a few seconds) or camera. Its only redeeming quality was the small form factor.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is very nice..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my 11 yr. old daughter and she absolutely LOVES it!!! Picture quality is very nice....she mostly uses her phone for texting, snap chatting, videos and pictures!! I currently own a Samsung Galaxy 2 and I'm considering buying a LG Volt for myself!! Very nice phone, no complaints here :)
customer_reviews.author: jo jo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment abounds
customer_reviews.text: I had this type of phone for years, and never had problems.. Until I broke the screen. I ordered a new one, and it froze up constantly, and was very slow. I exchanged it, thinking I'd just gotten a defect. The replacement has the same exact issues! Waste of money on what used to be a really good, reliable phone.
customer_reviews.author: DJDavis

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Phone was ok but only lasted a year. It froze sometimes in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: good afternoon, my name is wilmar benjamin I buy ...
customer_reviews.text: good afternoon, my name is wilmar benjamin I buy two phones LG VOLT that are incredible in all its functions but not I use in my country Venezuela that are blocked and I speak to you or provider if I could help somehow and this is the characteristics of one of the phones: SKU: LGLS740ABB MEID (HEX): 99000355597915 ICC ID: 89011200000388856014 MEID (DEC): 256691490105863701 is 4.4kitkat android 4.7 qHD IPS display with 1080p full HD video and 1.3MP front camera faciong , 3G / 4G LTE / LTE NETWORK ENHANCED HD VOICE ENABLED, QUAD CORE PROCESSOR 1.2 GHz, 3000 mAh battery up to 24 hours talk time, wi-fi, Bluetooth 4.0, NFC capable, quickremote universal remote control.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I will say that its probably one of the better phones I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Granted I've only had this phone a week. I will say that its probably one of the better phones I've ever had, I like it better than the galaxy series. It's pretty easy to use, the battery life is fantastic, I've used the music player while working all day and been at half battery at the end of the day. I'd definitely recommend this phone to anyone who was shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Nunley

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PHONE!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PHONE!! Setup is flawless..more automated than I anticipated! Porting my previous # to Boost took about 20 minutes..thought it would be 24 hours lol The remote TV app that was preinstalled works wekk...no setup needed...just point and click..AND I can still use the remote that I presently have
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Slavin

customer_reviews.title: my teen saw it and fell in love with it
customer_reviews.text: bought lg volt for myself. my teen saw it and fell in love with it. It was time to upgrade so I got him one. we can sync photos and more. very happy with product would recommend. thinking of buying another for older son.
customer_reviews.author: florence pryor

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone in my wish list and waited to black friday to order got it for 56$ with the shipping fees. Shipping was slow but it was cool. Note* Buy your phones new then you wont have any problems* Happy to get rid of that htc evo, dont kno how to act with a phone that has so much speed and good battery life. Lol
customer_reviews.author: MzThomas

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and get a better phone.
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this phone. Now less than a year later it needs to be replaced. The battery drains very fast, I'll go to work with 80% charge and 8 hours later the phone is dead! I am constantly killing apps so that they are not running and draining the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Springstead

customer_reviews.title: Camera and battery are great, but only 1 Gig of RAM
customer_reviews.text: Decent starter phone for those who want a little more from their device without signing away your first born child. Camera and battery are great, but only 1 Gig of RAM. Don't buy this if you like to run more than a couple apps simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Whirled Peas

customer_reviews.title: it functions just as good as my uber expensive phone
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it..it functions just as good as my uber expensive phone. The google talk feature and voice command are excellent it takes good pictures and its fast on or off WiFi! He's filled it with his nonsense already , games hulu Netflix YouTube and a calculator that does fractions !
customer_reviews.author: rehnyele greene

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Switched to this after I grew tired of over paying for lousy service with T-Mobile (plus I broke my original phone). I had a Samsung Galaxy II and I have to say that this phone has out performed my GII by far. Haven't had any service interruptions, it's speed is always fast, and I get signal where T-Mobile failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: My 12 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my daughter to replace her very faulty and defective Nokia Luma 635. I wish I bought this one first. She loves it and is so happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jemell M.

customer_reviews.title: I like the phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone, but I have had to do a factory reset twice since I've had it. The screen locks up and won't respond to touch. It is not compatible with the Jawbone UP Move fitness tracker I bought, so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dill

customer_reviews.title: Quickmemo is a nice feature and easy to operate at any moment
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent phone for the price. Only 4gb of ROM available out of 8gb. 1gb of RAM is decent enough. Can play games on it without lag. Quickmemo is a nice feature and easy to operate at any moment. Excellent battery life. The only cons I have found is that the LG keyboard doesn't always work but the Android keyboard works fine. Also when changing from game to game youll find some stray pixels that shouldn't be there. Doesn't last long though. Overall I would recommend this phone to anyone who doesn't want to spend $200+ for a decent smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Browder

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone for the price i paid. No complaints. Dont by pass this phone its great!
customer_reviews.author: FashionCB

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend it for low to moderate use
customer_reviews.text: My mom got this to take pictures and for my toddler sister to use to watch YouTube videos. I would definitely recommend it for low to moderate use, but know that some apps will be slow. The camera also isn't the best, but it takes good pictures nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Barcelo

customer_reviews.title: Slow slow slow
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Moto-G with this phone, and I hate it. The phone has some great features, but I've never encountered a more slow phone, ever. I thought this one being 4G that I it would be faster if anything. It freezes up a lot, too. I want my Moto-G back
customer_reviews.author: Kate G

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great. It charges so fast and it has such a long battery life. You do have to turn it off like once a day or so or else it gets overwhelmed and doesn't work as quickly. And I got an SD card for it as recommended because I was worried about overloading it but it hasn't been a problem yet. I don't have a ton of apps installed though.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Love the LG phone and boost mobile!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for about a month and being elderly it is taking me awhile to get it all together. With the help of my children and grandchildren I am catching on pretty good. Love the phone and would recommend it to everyone. Boost mobile is great and love the different packages they have to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: The phone works great so far but the new software update from LG ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great so far but the new software update from LG makes rooting a complex surgical procedure. Google also disables program write access to the SD card in Android 4.4 (which this phone uses) requiring yet another app after rooting to restore the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Brent F.

customer_reviews.title: sweet
customer_reviews.text: Phone is pretty sweet. I added 32gb sd card for extra space. The features are nice. I got this one after having the ZTE for a year. The screen on this phone is slightly bigger than the ZTE and the battery life is absolutely amazing. I would highly recommend this phone. Matter of fact i bought a 2nd one for my boyfriend who had the Moto G. He is also extremely happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: A bargain for this nice of a smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal at $60 for this phone. Talk about bang for your buck. This phone brings that like no other Boost Mobile phone. A definite five star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TheStreetDoc

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever owned. Not the fastest processor ever, not the best looking screen ever, not the best camera ever, but darn does it get good battery life. I can regularly go 48hrs on a single charge. If I start a day at 100%, even using lots of data and navigating with the GPS, I still have 40%+ by the end of the day. It's great. I'll gladly give up some of the fancy features to not ever be tied down to a phone charger again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my daughter and I feel I love this phone more then she does
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and I feel I love this phone more then she does. When I'm done paying off my 2 Apple iPhone 5c I'm gonna buy 2 of these LG Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN J. VARGAS

customer_reviews.title: I would give 4stars except the signal isnt that great in a lot of places
customer_reviews.text: I would give 4stars except the signal isnt that great in a lot of places. Overall i like the phone, pic and camcorder. The battery life is pretty good too, even in the red is lasted over an hour with my Pandora playing and using camcorder.
customer_reviews.author: LATERESA PORTER

customer_reviews.title: perfect phone...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is 179.99 on boost mobile.com but i got it on here for only 59.99$ i saved alot of money the phone was at my door step within less than 2 days the phone works very very good no problems at all also the battery life is very good it will last me up till 2 days untill i need to recharge it the 8mp camera is the best ive seen its even better than my galaxy s3 from boost mobile i love this phone very very much if anyone wants to ask me about the phone you can give me a call at 3135566405
customer_reviews.author: darius

customer_reviews.title: Way better than samsuck because this phone works and doesn't lag ...
customer_reviews.text: Way better than samsuck because this phone works and doesn't lag or crash constantly. Super impress with the video and image quality the camera shoots.
customer_reviews.author: kim y seng

customer_reviews.title: ... phone a little under a month and am VERY happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had the phone a little under a month and am VERY happy with it...I'm also very happy with boost mobile service
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: WE HAD A SMART PHONE PREVIOUSLY WITH VERIZON BUT IT GOT TOO EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: WE HAD A SMART PHONE PREVIOUSLY WITH VERIZON BUT IT GOT TOO EXPENSIVE . SO IT HAD BEEN TWO YEARS SINCE WE WE HAD AN UPGRADE. WE WERE AMAZED AT HOW MUCH MODERN TECHNOLOGY HAD IMPROVED. TO SAY THE LEAST WE ARE VERY HAPPY WITH OUR PURCHASE AND WOULD DO IT AGAIN IF NECESSARY !
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY S.

customer_reviews.title: LG phone is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, LG is a brand that still takes pride in its work. All the same features of the popular bamrand phones with a 1/4 of the cost. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BleedBlue214

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This phone works really great is really fast and has good battery i'm higly recomended this phone.
customer_reviews.author: peri

customer_reviews.title: nice looking phone but has its problems
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this phone is at a high price this phone needs to be $39.99 or $49.99 it not a good phone it freezes a lot little ram i got this phone replace 5 times stay away from this phone
customer_reviews.author: djphantac

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage daughter and she loves it. Especially the camera features. Also bought a case, screen protectors and an RCA charging stand. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene England

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. But needs a stronger phone cover
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. But needs a stronger phone cover. Especially the back piece it is very thin plastic. But good thing is it's a 3 - 4 G and battery last very long period. Great battery.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: uber cool
customer_reviews.text: The phone works as a remote..,im blown away by that as well as tje miracast funtion. Watching my phone on tv....COOL
customer_reviews.author: Eternal

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with great battery life and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great phone with great battery life and functionality. Recommended to anyone looking for a good smartphone at a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Nivala

customer_reviews.title: Phone works great. Using it for the review
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great. Using it for the review. Long battery life and good picture,sound. The quad core processor works great.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: bad cell phone and service from LG
customer_reviews.text: charger stopped working after 8 months. LG said it was not covered by warranty and wanted me to pay $134 for repair. I would not recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Artur R Soltysiak

customer_reviews.title: Get this phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was under a hundred dollars...are...you ...kidding ME?! I have had an IPhone 5, HTC One M8, and Samsung Galaxy 3 phones..and this phone actually beats them all! Has a cool led multicolor lit home button, feels very well constructed and built, downloads apps, updates way more faster than my previous phones, and is easier to learn without manuals( if you've owned android phones before). This phone is great and i'm actually saving $10 a month with Boost, paying $35 vs. $45 with VW and includes 1G of data vs 500mb with VW. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life Bright screen Knock code Cons
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this phone but it has turned out to be a merely average phone. I would not purchase again. Pros: Great battery life Bright screen Knock code Cons: lags often Seems to have a weak cellular radio Has force restarted several times
customer_reviews.author: Annaly pardino

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone!
customer_reviews.text: For the cheapo like me, this is the best phone a cheapo can buy. It has the new Android OS, an IR Blaster (TV/Cable Box remote control), and a price tag under $100. Can't beat it, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. INC

customer_reviews.title: its good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it has been a great phone so far. Now that its memory is somewhat full, it has slowed down quite a bit, but thats to be expected by mosy phones. Holds a charge well.
customer_reviews.author: On the move momma

customer_reviews.title: Great LG, 4G phone
customer_reviews.text: Great LG , 4G phone. Nice big screen without being too oversized. Battery lasts all day, plus with boost you can get a 5 G data plan for $55.
customer_reviews.author: oweemytoe

customer_reviews.title: For the price its a good phone, but it is a bit slow and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price its a good phone, but it is a bit slow and the internal memory isnt that great.
customer_reviews.author: SRod

customer_reviews.title: It's not state of the art but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about four months now, and I got it when it was on sale for $80 and the "retail" price was around $300 or $400. It's kind of buggy and needs be restarted every so many days because it just won't cooperate. My biggest issue is that sometimes it won't show push notifications, like a recent text or Facebook message. I'm also a picky person so take this review with a grain of salt. All in all for the price I payed it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I was using a samsung replenish. The volt is way more then i expected my lady has a s3 and i use her phone and i like it they do the same thing. I read the reviews anyone with problems may have got a bad phone. This is rt up there with the s3 and i got it for 67.00 with free shipping come on what else can u ask for.

customer_reviews.title: Went from a 2yr old 3G to this and LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Have had the phone for about a month now and have had one time of the screen freezing but other than that love this phone. Went from a 2yr old 3G to this one and have been shocked of all the thongs i have been missing. Now my son has his first Smart phone and loves it as well

customer_reviews.title: So many great featutes. For tgose that have bought this there ...
customer_reviews.text: Libe this phone. So many great featutes. For tgose that have bought this there is a guest mode on this phone for those that want to use your phone but you dont want them to see your stuff. Best feature

customer_reviews.title: great phone and stands up for what it says great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my mother in law because she was tired of using hers it was too small too slow didn't function well at times this one so far is doing the trick I recommend this phone for anybody
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this to use the smart Bluetooth, so I could use the Garmin fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use the smart Bluetooth, so I could use the Garmin fit app. Works great for that purpose. Takes nice pictures and as long as you don't have too many apps running doesn't run slow. Depends on your service.
customer_reviews.author: melissa prusinski

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry level phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice entry level phone. Cant beat the price. Dont expect top tier mobile device but definitely not at the bottom of the barrel. Talk is good, text is good and looking for a pizza while running an app is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dion L.

customer_reviews.title: great quality, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for the price the quality is amazing. Replaced my Samsung galaxy s2.i wanted the s5 but wayyyyy too much money. Decided to go with the volt and i am not complaining at all, not to mention the battery life is so much better. used it pretty much non stop and it still lasted over 24 hours

customer_reviews.text: Love this phone!! Does everything fast and easy. I have no complaints. I got one for my mom as well and she loves hers.

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone, except for the fact I can't use ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good phone, except for the fact I can't use data while in a call. And I get like one bar of reception when all my old boost phones had perfect reception. If it wasnt for that I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This was my first smart phone and I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: This was my first smart phone and I LOVE it... It is VERY easy to use. Fast. ALWAYS has a bright screen and does a LOT more then I ever thought it would do. If you are looking for your first smart phone, you can NOT go wrong with this phone! HIGHLY recommended

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the phone is good.
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen is not very user friendly. Hard to navigate due to this issue.Other than that the phone is good.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love dis phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love dis phone!!!! I upgraded from a LG Venice and it's a complete difference. It does so much I just don't have any complaints thus far. If you want a Galaxy and can't really afford it I highly recommend dis phone. It's a plus👐

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT!!! I love this phone!This phone has everything you need! When battery full charged you can use phone 24hours minimum! I am very satisfied with amazon service! I ordered two: for my son for Christmas prezent and one for me!Thank you amazon for this great phone!

customer_reviews.text: bought two of these ... both work fine and no issues noted.

product_meta.title: LG Volt Black (Boost Mobile)
product_meta.description: The Boost Mobile LG Volt Prepaid Smartphone has the features you need to connect to your world on the go. With its Android 4.4.2 (KitKat) operating system, you can complete most any task and navigate your device with ease. This Boost Mobile smartphone features Bluetooth v.4.0 + A2DP to allow you to pair with the latest wireless headsets, speakers and more. It has a rear 8 MP camera with an LED flash for capturing crisp, clear images and a 1.3 MP front-facing camera for applications such as video chat. The hardware on the Boost Mobile LG Volt prepaid smartphone boasts a beautiful 4.7" IPS LCD touchscreen and a microSD slot for expanding memory. *SIM Card not included
feature_bullets: 4.7 inch qHD Display with Corning Gorilla Glass
8MP rear facing BSI camera and 1.3 MP front facing camera
GPS, Bluetooth, wifi and messaging supported

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,000 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
